opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: American Home Products Corp. v. Collins

opinion:
544 U.S. 991

AMERICAN HOME PRODUCTS CORP. ET AL.
v.
COLLINS ET AL.

No. 04-674.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 18, 2005.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion and this petition. Reported below: 343 F. 3d 765.
